
    /* Begin Modalfree */
    html.modalfree-show {
        overflow: hidden;
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }
    #modalfree-wrapper {
        position: fixed;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        top: 0;
        left: -100%;
        text-align: center;
        opacity: 0;
        z-index: 10;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
    html.modalfree-show #modalfree-wrapper {
        left: 0;
        opacity: 1;
    }
    #modalfree {
        position: relative;
        height: 100%;
        min-height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        top: 0;
        font-size: 0;
        text-align: center;
        overflow-y: scroll;
        z-index: 1;
    }
    #modalfree-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .65);
    }
    #modalfree-window {
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block;
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 420px;
        margin: 100px auto 20px;
    }
    #modalfree-close {
        position: absolute;
        display: inline-block;
        height: 48px;
        width: 48px;
        top: 0;
        right: 0;
        line-height: 48px;
        text-align: center;
        cursor: pointer;
        overflow: hidden;
        opacity: .6;
        z-index: 1;
        transition: .2s;
    }
    #modalfree-close > svg {
        display: inline-block;
        height: 12px;
        width: 12px;
    }
    #modalfree-close:hover {
        opacity: 1;
    }
    #modalfree-close:active {
        opacity: .5;
    }
    #modalfree-content {
        font-size: 13px;
        font-weight: 400;
        color: #808080;
        line-height: 18px;
    }
    #modalfree-content > *:first-child {
        border-top-left-radius: 4px;
        border-top-right-radius: 4px;
    }
    #modalfree-content > *:last-child {
        border-bottom-right-radius: 4px;
        border-bottom-left-radius: 4px;
    }
    #modalfree-content-header {
        position: relative;
        padding: 54px 20px 30px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-weight: 400;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #fff;
        line-height: 17px;
        /* Permalink - use to edit and share this gradient: https://colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/#00a649+0,00d144+100 */
        background: #00a649; /* Old browsers */
        background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #00a649 0%, #00d144 100%); /* FF3.6-15 */
        background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #00a649 0%, #00d144 100%); /* Chrome10-25,Safari5.1-6 */
        background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00a649 0%, #00d144 100%); /* W3C, IE10+, FF16+, Chrome26+, Opera12+, Safari7+ */
        filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#00a649', endColorstr='#00d144', GradientType=0); /* IE6-9 */
    }
    #modalfree-content-header:before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        display: block;
        height: 120px;
        width: 120px;
        top: -60px;
        left: 50%;
        margin-left: -60px;
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
    }
    #modalfree-content-header:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        display: block;
        height: 57px;
        width: 57px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
    }
    #modalfree-content-header > h1 {
        padding-bottom: 8px;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 26px;
        color: #fff;
        line-height: 36px;
    }
    #modalfree-content-body {
        padding: 15px 30px 40px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background-color: #fff;
    }
    #modalfree-content-body-list {
        max-width: 260px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 10px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        text-align: left;
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item {
        position: relative;
        padding: 15px 0 15px 50px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-size: 0;
        line-height: 32px;
        white-space: nowrap;
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item:before {
        content: '';
        display: inline-block;
        height: 32px;
        width: 0;
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        display: block;
        height: 32px;
        width: 32px;
        top: 15px;
        left: 0;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item[data-type="quality"]:after {
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item[data-type="nickname"]:after {
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item[data-type="advertisements"]:after {
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item[data-type="badge"]:after {
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    }
    .modalfree-content-body-list-item > span {
        display: inline-block;
        font-weight: 400;
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #000;
        line-height: 19px;
        text-align: left;
        vertical-align: middle;
        white-space: normal;
    }
    #modalfree-content-body > a {
        display: block;
        height: 40px;
        margin: 25px 0 10px;
        padding: 0 30px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #fff;
        line-height: 40px;
        letter-spacing: 1px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        background-color: #38cd57;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: .2s;
    }
    #modalfree-content-body > a:hover,
    #modalfree-content-body > a:active {
        background-color: #13a832;
    }
    #modalfree-info {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 440px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 0 10px 100px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-weight: 400;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #cecece;
        line-height: 18px;
    }

    @media  screen and (max-width: 360px) {
        #modalfree-content-body-list {
            padding: 0;
        }
        #modalfree-content-body > a {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }
    }
    /* End Modalfree */
   
    #notify-bar {
        position: fixed;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        justify-content: center;
        height: 87px;
        min-height: 87px;
        width: 100%;
        top: -87px;
        left: 0;
        padding: 0 30px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-size: 0;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .8);
        text-align: center;
        z-index: 4;
        transition: top .2s;
    }
    #notify-bar.show {
        top: 0;
    }
    #notify-bar.error {
        background-color: #e53951;
    }
    #notify-bar.accept {
        background-color: #38cd57;
    }
    #notify-bar.warning {
        background-color: #f29e1f;
    }
    #notify-bar-text {
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #fff;
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
    #notify-bar-text:before,
    #notify-bar-buttons:before {
        content: '';
        display: inline-block;
        height: 100%;
        width: 0;
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
    #notify-bar-text > span {
        display: inline-block;
        max-height: 66px;
        line-height: 22px;
        white-space: normal;
        vertical-align: middle;
        overflow: hidden;
        cursor: default;
    }

    #notify-bar-buttons {
        white-space: nowrap;
    }
    #notify-bar-buttons > * {
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
    #notify-bar-buttons > *:focus {
        outline: none;
    }

    #notify-bar-button-close {
        display: none;
        margin-left: 4px;
        padding: 10px;
        border: none;
        background: none;
        cursor: pointer;
    }
    #notify-bar-buttons.notify-bar-button-close > #notify-bar-button-close {
        display: inline-block;
    }
    #notify-bar-button-close > svg > path {
        transition: .2s;
    }
    #notify-bar-button-close:hover > svg > path {
        opacity: .8;
    }
    #notify-bar-button-close:active > svg > path {
        opacity: 1;
    }

    #notify-bar-button-custom {
        display: none;
        margin-left: 26px;
        padding: 0 24px;
        border: 1px solid #fff;
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #fff;
        line-height: 30px;
        background: transparent;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: background-color .2s,
        color .2s;
    }
    #notify-bar-buttons.notify-bar-button-custom > #notify-bar-button-custom {
        display: inline-block;
    }
    #notify-bar-button-custom:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .8);
    }
    #notify-bar.error #notify-bar-button-custom:hover {
        background-color: #fff;
        color: #e53951;
    }
    #notify-bar.accept #notify-bar-button-custom:hover {
        background-color: #fff;
        color: #38cd57;
    }
    #notify-bar.warning #notify-bar-button-custom:hover {
        background-color: #fff;
        color: #f29e1f;
    }
